RelatedSentence: As of March 2012 , there were 295,000 so - called Centrex telephone lines provided by Bell Canada to federal government departments and agencies in Ontario and Quebec , where the vast majority of public servants work .
Shared Services Canada is working to get rid of as many of these lines as possible , with the goal of reducing the federal telephone bill by $ 28.8 million by 2015 .
